name: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT
summary: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT is designed to provide a brand new experience of combat and world exploration, featuring a boundless movement system, an aim-at-whatever-you-want grappling hook, and a sophisticated combat system involving accessible block & parry mechanics.
